title: Important: Here's CARCASS Partying To "Feliz Navidad" On Stage
description: Jeff Walker would like to wish you a Merry Christmas... from a special place.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 7 hours ago
excerpt: Jeff Walker would like to wish you a Merry Christmas... from a special place.
text: José Feliciano recorded and released his Christmas classic "Feliz Navidad" in 1970, and in 2024 Carcass partied hard to the song on stage. Or at least bassist and vocalist Jeff Walker did, with a special lyrical change of "from the bottom of my heart" to "the bottom of my arse." If this doesn't get you into the Christmas spirit, you might just hate Christmas… and that's your fault. Speaking of Carcass, they're gonna tour with Meshuggah and Cannibal Corpse across North America in 2025! The tour kicks off on March 28 at Videotron Centre in Quebec City, QC, and wraps on April 24 at The Theater at Madison Square Garden in New York, NY. Tickets are available here. 3/28 Quebec City, QC Videotron Centre3/29 Toronto, ON Great Canadian Resort Toronto3/30 Detroit, MI The Fillmore Detroit4/1 Chicago, IL Byline Bank Aragon Ballroom4/2 St. Louis, MO The Pageant4/4 Denver, CO Fillmore Auditorium4/5 Salt Lake City, UT The Complex4/6 Boise, ID Revolution Concert House and Event Center4/8 San Francisco, CA The Masonic4/9 Los Angeles, CA The Kia Forum4/10 Reno, NV Grand Theatre at The Grand Sierra Resort4/11 Las Vegas, NV The Theater at Virgin Hotels Las Vegas4/13 Phoenix, AZ Arizona Financial Theatre4/15 Austin, TX ACL Live – Moody Theater4/16 Dallas, TX South Side Ballroom4/18 Atlanta, GA Coca-Cola Roxy4/19 Tampa, FL Yuengling Center4/22 Pittsburgh, PA Stage AE4/23 National Harbor, MD The Theater at MGM National Harbor4/24 New York, NY The Theater at Madison Square Garden Want More Metal? html:
José Feliciano recorded and released his Christmas classic "Feliz Navidad" in 1970, and in 2024 Carcass partied hard to the song on stage. Or at least bassist and vocalist Jeff Walker did, with a special lyrical change of "from the bottom of my heart" to "the bottom of my arse." If this doesn't get you into the Christmas spirit, you might just hate Christmas… and that's your fault.

Speaking of Carcass, they're gonna tour with Meshuggah and Cannibal Corpse across North America in 2025! The tour kicks off on March 28 at Videotron Centre in Quebec City, QC, and wraps on April 24 at The Theater at Madison Square Garden in New York, NY. Tickets are available here.
